verses.roman:
prabhu kahe,--"govinda, āji rākhilā jīvana
strī-paraśa haile āmāra ha-ita maraṇa

synonyms: prabhu kahe—Lord Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu said; govinda—My dear Govinda; āji—today; rākhilā jīvana—you saved My life; strī-paraśa haile—if I had touched a woman; āmāra—My; ha-ita—there would have been; maraṇa—death.
translation: "My dear Govinda," He said, "you have saved My life. If I had touched the body of a woman, I would certainly have died.
